original_text:
He built his sanctuary like the heights,
    like the earth that he established forever.
korean_text: 그의 성소를 산의 높음 같이, 영원히 두신 땅 같이 지으셨도다

sentences.original_text: He built his sanctuary like the heights
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그의 성소를 높은 곳처럼 세웠다

sentences.original_text: like the earth that he established forever
